title: What is the Munich tennis schedule?
description: The BMW Open by Bitpanda continues Thursday in Munich. Fourth seed Ugo Humbert and fifth seed Francisco Cerundolo headline the action, with quarter-final places on the line. View Thursday's full order of play below (how to watch).  ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, 17 APRIL 2025 Center Court - start 11:00 David Goffin (BEL) vs. Mariano Navone (ARG) [5] Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) vs. [LL} Alexander Shevchenko (KAZ) Zizou Bergs (BEL) vs. [LL] Diego Dedura-Palomero (GER) [4] Ugo Humbert (FRA) vs. Fabian Marozsan (HUN) Court 1 - start 11:00 Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Ben Shelton (USA) vs. Sander Gille (BEL) / Jan Zielinski (POL) [1] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) vs. Sadio Doumbia (FRA) / Fabien Reboul (FRA) [WC] Jakob Schnaitter (GER) / Mark Wallner (GER) vs. Justin Engel (GER) / Max Hans Rehberg (GER) Not Before 17:00 Andre Goransson (SWE) / Sem Verbeek (NED) vs. [Alt] Guido Andreozzi (ARG) / Theo Arribage (FRA) Para Court - start 11:00 [1] Alfie Hewett (GBR) vs. Nicolas Charrier (FRA) [WC] Nico Langmann (AUT) vs. Gaetan Menguy (FRA) Gordon Reid (GBR) vs. [2] Gustavo Fernandez (ARG) Maikel Scheggers (NED) vs. Joachim Gerard (BEL) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

Munich

View the full Thursday order of play for Munich

April 16, 2025

BMW Open by Bitpanda

The BMW Open by Bitpanda is now an ATP 500 event. By ATP Staff

The BMW Open by Bitpanda continues Thursday in Munich. Fourth seed Ugo Humbert and fifth seed Francisco Cerundolo headline the action, with quarter-final places on the line.

View Thursday's full order of play below (how to watch). 

You May Also Like: Munich breakout star Dedura on his tennis identity and love of 'the grind'

ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, 17 APRIL 2025
Center Court - start 11:00
David Goffin (BEL) vs. Mariano Navone (ARG)
[5] Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) vs. [LL} Alexander Shevchenko (KAZ)
Zizou Bergs (BEL) vs. [LL] Diego Dedura-Palomero (GER)
[4] Ugo Humbert (FRA) vs. Fabian Marozsan (HUN)

Court 1 - start 11:00
Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Ben Shelton (USA) vs. Sander Gille (BEL) / Jan Zielinski (POL)
[1] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) vs. Sadio Doumbia (FRA) / Fabien Reboul (FRA)
[WC] Jakob Schnaitter (GER) / Mark Wallner (GER) vs. Justin Engel (GER) / Max Hans Rehberg (GER)

Not Before 17:00
Andre Goransson (SWE) / Sem Verbeek (NED) vs. [Alt] Guido Andreozzi (ARG) / Theo Arribage (FRA)

Para Court - start 11:00
[1] Alfie Hewett (GBR) vs. Nicolas Charrier (FRA)
[WC] Nico Langmann (AUT) vs. Gaetan Menguy (FRA)
Gordon Reid (GBR) vs. [2] Gustavo Fernandez (ARG)
Maikel Scheggers (NED) vs. Joachim Gerard (BEL)
